column3: Well.... what are the 3 LOC right before the sleep?  What do they do, and why would a sleep after it be a good idea?\n
I assume they are there to make sure no other thread is blocking on that semaphore. The sleep is probably there to give it some time to do something...\n
_if_ the sleep is important it is an awfully fragile way of doing things, there is no guarantee anything will change in those 50 milliseconds.\n

Seems the sleep has pretty much been there forever (_much_ longer than the semaphore posts before it). I think we can assume that whatever reason it was there in the first place is not relevant anymore. utACK.\n

> Well.... what are the 3 LOC right before the sleep? What do they do, and why would a sleep after it be a good idea?

Yess, why, that's the million bitcoin question. Too bad we can't ask Satoshi anymore.
